lead_paragraph: In Hanover, Germany, Nikolai Valuev of Russia kept his World Boxing Association heavyweight title, knocking out Owen Beck of Jamaica yesterday in the third round. It was the first fight for Valuev (44-0, 32 knockouts) since taking the title from John Ruiz on a controversial decision in December.
